_sText: The final version of the map. Added: cubemap, fog, HDR, lightglow, props and changed the lighting. And light weight some levels and fixed bugs. Map contains up to 30 levels including passing, shop, spikes, trains, platforms. Levels can take many tries if you fall, then you go back to the beginning of the level if you miraculously dropped on a hard surface, 99999 HP will save you.
